page.title: 11WYTHALL INSTITUTE
page.content: The institute is the centre for many local activities including the Womens Institute, the Darby and Joan Club and the following: I went to a disco from 7.00 to 9.00 pm. There were flashing lights and good music. It cost 50p with rereshments.I met my old friend Heidi.Regular jumble sales are held in aid of various causes, including the preservation of the hall and patients at local hospitals. I have been to Wythall Institute for Ballet exams.When I was called in by the teacher,someone played the piano in the big hall and I did my ballet. Darby and Joan club meet Thursday afternoons. There are sixty Members. Outings and parties are often organized for them.{Silvermead.
